name: Shoot The Invaders!
description:
Oh no!!! Your lovely planet has been invaded by terrible foes! Ready your spaceship and defend the planet from the invaders in this arcade space shooter game.

How To Play

Move with the left and right arrow keys.

Your ship starts with 5 ENERGY, when you get hit you lose 1 ENERGY, if your ENERGY drops to 0 your ship is destroyed... quite simple for now!

Depending on how much ENERGY you've got, your ATTACK can increase:

with 5 ENERGY  your ATTACK can grow up to 4, with 4 ENERGY  your ATTACK can grow up to 3...and so on.

Be careful,  if your ENERGY drops to 1 your maximum ATTACK becomes 1 too.

Destroy the invaders' ships to gain points, if you let some of the enemies' ships pass you will lose some points... try to make the highest score you can!!!

Features

- Terrible foes

- A brave commander(...that would be you)

- power-ups, bullets, explosions!!!!

- Saves your highscore
